start.description: You are at the start of a mysterious forest path. You can go north or east.

cabin.description: You have entered a small wooden cabin. There's a key on the table. You can go south or west.

river.description: You are standing by a flowing river. You see a boat and a bridge. You can go west or north.

mountain.description: You have climbed the mountain. The view is stunning. There's a cave entrance here. You can go east.

cave.description: You are inside a dark cave. It's cold and damp. There's a treasure chest here. You can go west.
